thread.title: Slater and Gordon times investor trip for Rugby World Cup final
thread.title_full: Slater and Gordon times investor trip for Rugby World Cup final | afr.com

author: Share via Email
title: Slater and Gordon times investor trip for Rugby World Cup final
text:
How convenient: The Rugby Union World Cup final is at Twickenham on October 31, the day after Slater & Gordon's trip. Useful timing for visiting Antipodean analysts and fund managers in hunt of a work related tax deductible trip. Getty Images Share on twitter Share on Google Plus by Will Glasgow Hats off to Slater and Gordon.
Andrew Grech 's listed law firm has organised a day trip to their newly acquired UK assets ( which were bought off regulatory favourite, Quindell, in interesting circumstances ).
Slater's investor relations manager Melinda George herself wrote to tell us about the "invitation only" trip.
Not really. A few invitees let us know about the 8am to 6pm adventure to Slater's recently acquired sites in Blackpool, Liverpool and Manchester.
The invited have to pay their own way to schlep around the dreary business parks of northern England in autumn. It sounds horrible.
But then we checked the date: Friday, October 30, the day before the Rugby World Cup at Twickenham.
Useful timing for visiting Antipodean analysts and fund managers in hunt of a work related travel tax deduction. Well played.
